events.cause: Algorithmic stablecoin death spiral — Luna/UST collapse
Silicon Valley Bank collapse — $3.3B of Circle reserves held at SVB
events.recovery: Full peg restored after Fed BTFP backstop and Circle confirmation of reserves
events.systemic_impact: Temporary contagion to DAI and FRAX. Demonstrated banking concentration risk.

events.cause: Cascading from USDC depeg — DAI collateral includes significant USDC
Brief market panic from Curve pool imbalance

note: Depeg events are tracked as risk signals, not to discourage adoption. A mature financial instrument should have a documented history of stress events and recoveries.
